author: Samjktw
title: Decentralized version of ebay
description: With the centralized nature of Ebay and Amazon. They have a bit of a monopoly on online shopping.

assessments.note: There is no detail. This is the germ of an idea, not a proposal.
The initial idea is good, but it is unclear from the limited information provided how this project would scale and if the plan, if there is any, can be realisable in a timeframe of 6 months.

Draft proposal. The problem and solution description makes sense and has the potential to address the challenge, but there is no detail or plan to assess the impact and alignment of the proposal with the challenge. I recommend including details according to the Catalyst documentation.

There might be something to it, but the proposer has acknowledged in the comments section that he doesn't have the necessary expertise to finish writing the proposal: "I need to say this. I would not be able to complete this project. I just wanted the idea on here. I know it's possible! I am working on a more detailed plan. But I couldn't except money for it. I am just not capable of creating the Dapp. I just hope the right person sees it."
Please produce a plan on how you would go about implementing this idea.

The proposer's experience does not apply to the proposed idea. There is no plan on how the idea could be implemented, how and who could develop it. 
Without a context of plan, it is not likely to succeed.
Draft proposal. There is not enough plan or information about the proposer / team to assess the feasibility of the proposal. I recommend including more details so we can give appropriate feedback.

I appreciate the proposer's honesty about not being able to complete the project, yet I feel that in this case he should have withdrawn the proposal and maybe submit it in the InSight session of Fund6.
No plan. Not feasible. Please produce a plan on what you would do, a breakdown of how you would fund it, market it etc.

The author is asking for a 250k USD fund without providing more context to an idea longer than 2 sentences. It needs a written out plan, a roadmap , a funding breakdown, a risk assessment as your competition would be large multinationals, a team to build it, etc.
Draft proposal. There is no information that makes it possible to assess auditability. Include more information according to the Catalyst documentation.
The proposal should be resubmitted with a complete description, detailed budget, metrics for a future fund.

solution: Create a decentralized marketplace for consumer products. Just like Ebay but completely decentralized.
